description: Specific properties that are required for a material actual shall be presented as material actual properties.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: contains
contents.description: The material actual property(s) of this material actual property

contents.name: mapsToClassProperty
contents.description: A cross-model dependency to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8

contents.name: mapsToDefinitionProperty
contents.description: A cross-model dependency to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8

contents.name: mapsToLotProperty
contents.description: A cross-model dependency to element in the material model as explained in Clause 3.3.8

contents.name: description
contents.description: Contains additional information and descriptions of the property

contents.name: value
contents.description: The value, set of values, or range of the property.

contents.name: valueUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated property value

contents.name: quantity
contents.description: Specifies the material resource produced or used by the parent segment

contents.name: quantityUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated quantity
